mosinstall.name: 站点统计
mosinstall.author: Mambo Project
mosinstall.description: The Statistics module shows information about your server installation and statistics on the web site users, number of contents in your database, and number of web links you provide.

param.name: serverinfo
param.label: 服务器信息
param.description: 是否显示服务器详细信息

param.name: siteinfo
param.label: 站点信息
param.description: 是否显示站点统计信息

param.name: increase
param.label: 计数器初始值
param.description: 输入一个计数器初始值

param.name: moduleclass_sfx
param.label: 模块css后缀
param.description: 用来定义模块的css类型(table.moduletable)的后缀，这样允许模块使用单独的css风格
